meanings.definition: Used to express admiration or desire.
meanings.sent2: Oh, phwoar, that sunset is beautiful!
meanings.sent3: Phwoar, that puppy is so cute!
meanings.sent4: The colors of the rainbow were a phwoar of beauty.
meanings.sent5: The phwoar of the mountain view took my breath away.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of appreciation for someone's physical appearance.
meanings.sent1: Wow, phwoar, she looks stunning in that dress!
meanings.sent2: Phwoar, he really knows how to dress sharp!
meanings.sent3: Phwoar, that hairstyle is on point!
meanings.sent4: The elegance of the ballerina was a phwoar of grace.
meanings.sent5: The phwoar of her smile lit up the room.
